H0.text: Stomach is an example of a tissue in the human body, consisting of a group of cells that work together to perform a specific function.

H1.text: Platelets are an example of a tissue in the human body, a group of cells that work together to perform a specific function as part of the body's levels of organization.

H2.text: Muscle is an example of a tissue in the human body, a group of cells that work together to perform a specific function.

H3.text: Hair is an example of a tissue in the human body, a level of organization where a group of cells work together to perform a specific function.

A4.text: Muscle is a specialised soft tissue, one of the four basic types of animal tissues.

A5.text: Muscle tissue gives skeletal muscles the ability to contract and relax.
